data.message: Hi, I have a problem with my account, Leirbag Aerdnoc, it is beeing verfied over 4 months now, and I can`t acces it. This is my bussiness account that I use. How can I contact facebook? How can I sent a picture of my ID? How long do I have to wait? It is been over 4 months now....Please, I need an answer and I hope that my problem will be solved as soon as possible.

replies.message: Hi Agromec. Please reach out to our Facebook for Business team for questions about Pages and ads: http://bit.ly/2jWctX2. -Hannah

Facebook It is not about this account, from which I write, It is about an another account,  Leirbag Aerdnoc account, my personal account, that it is in verification over 4 months now...How can i contact facebook, to send a picture ID and to solve this problem because it is taking to long. Thank you.
